pullrequest.title: [Windows][Gazebo9] Fix for test related compile failures

content.raw:
I think this patch would make codecheck happy

~~~
diff -r 230a46b4296d gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc
--- a/gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc	Tue Mar 05 10:53:21 2019 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc	Tue Mar 05 10:53:38 2019 -0800
@@ -17,13 +17,13 @@
 
 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
 
+#ifdef _WIN32
+  #include <winsock.h>  // timeval
+#endif
+
 #include "gazebo/common/Time.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"
 
-#ifdef _WIN32
-  #include <winsock.h> // timeval
-#endif
-
 using namespace gazebo;
 
 class TimeTest : public gazebo::testing::AutoLogFixture { };
diff -r 230a46b4296d test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc
--- a/test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc	Tue Mar 05 10:53:21 2019 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc	Tue Mar 05 10:53:38 2019 -0800
@@ -16,16 +16,16 @@
 */
 
 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
+#include <chrono>
+#include <thread>
+#include <random>
+
 #include <ignition/math/Pose3.hh>
 #include "gazebo/physics/physics.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/helper_physics_generator.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"
 
-#include <chrono>
-#include <thread>
-#include <random>
-
 #define TOL 0.001
 using namespace gazebo;
 
~~~
content.html:
I think this patch would make codecheck happy

diff -r 230a46b4296d gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc
--- a/gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc    Tue Mar 05 10:53:21 2019 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/common/Time_TEST.cc    Tue Mar 05 10:53:38 2019 -0800
@@ -17,13 +17,13 @@

 #include <gtest/gtest.h>

+#ifdef _WIN32
+  #include <winsock.h>  // timeval
+#endif
+
 #include "gazebo/common/Time.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"

-#ifdef _WIN32
-  #include <winsock.h> // timeval
-#endif
-
 using namespace gazebo;

 class TimeTest : public gazebo::testing::AutoLogFixture { };
diff -r 230a46b4296d test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc
--- a/test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc   Tue Mar 05 10:53:21 2019 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc   Tue Mar 05 10:53:38 2019 -0800
@@ -16,16 +16,16 @@
 */

 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
+#include <chrono>
+#include <thread>
+#include <random>
+
 #include <ignition/math/Pose3.hh>
 #include "gazebo/physics/physics.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh"
 #include "gazebo/test/helper_physics_generator.hh"
 #include "test/util.hh"

-#include <chrono>
-#include <thread>
-#include <random>
-
 #define TOL 0.001
 using namespace gazebo;
